thread.section_title: AirFreight.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirFreight.com | airfreight.com
thread.title: Chris R

author: Chris R
title: Chris R
text:
Just wanted to take a minute to let all you business owners know this company is legit and gets hard to move shipments with unrealistic timelines done instantly. Called Brian with a delivery that needed to happen 14 hours away he had a hot shot truck here in less the one hour and our crate was on the way to my customer. Excellent communication and outstanding service. A+A+A+
Thanks,
Chris R
Northwest Indiana business owner.
